questions.question: So what do you think is the nature of the process that seems to lead to progress?
So do you, you said you could live with it, but do you think God plays dice in our universe?
Do we have a, are we just another set of molecules connected together in a clever way?
Do you hope that the stories will eventually lead us to discovering the real world as it is?
And every day I wake up and think, why can't I be that guy who was walking through the airport?
So let me ask, what's your sense of Sean and the idea of many worlds interpretation?
